org.deidentifier.arx.kettle.define

Class LayoutTransformationModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deidentifier.arx.kettle.define.LayoutTransformationModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LayoutCompositeInterface

    public class LayoutTransformationModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements LayoutCompositeInterface
    Contains the Tabs and View for the Transformation Model.

    Tabs

    • Tranformation Settings
    • Utility Measure
    • Attribut Weight
    • Coding Model

    Visibility

    The Visibility of the Tabs is defined after the Support through the Metrics from the Utility Measure Tab.
    Since:
    1.7
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Florian Wiedner
